Overview
System Feature Permissions (formerly part of 
Manager Permissions
) allow for system administrators to personalize their copy of SmartSimple to make various system objects available to users in different roles.
System Objects
 include things such as the 
Delete
 button on company 
profiles
 or the button to create a new 
transaction
.
Company Permission
 
Disable Delete
 - Hide Delete button within an Organization profile for selected roles 
 
Enable Batch Update
 - Expose Batch Update button when record selected from Organization list view for selected roles 
 
Enable Batch Update Owner
 
 
Enable Edit All Companies
 
 
Enable Save Draft
 - Expose Save Draft button within an Organization profile for selected roles 
 
Hide New Company Menu Item on Company Profile
 - Restrict ability to create new company from within a Company profile for selected roles 
 
Restrict Company Access to Companies with Categories
 - Restrict ability to view and edit companies with no assigned category for selected roles 
 
Restrict Company and Contact Access to Assigned Category Permissions
 - Restrict ability to view and edit companies based on category permissions for selected roles 
 
Restrict Company and Contact Access to Associated Companies
 - Restrict ability to only view and edit associated companies for selected roles 
 
Restrict Company and Contact Access to User Owned Companies
 - Restrict ability to only view and edit companies where they are the Owner 
 
Restrict Company and Contact Access to User Owned Companies and Company of User
 - Restrict ability to only view and edit companies where they are the Owner or it is there parent company
User Permission
 
Disable Delete
 - Hide Delete button within a Contact profile for selected roles 
 
Enable Batch Update
 - Expose Batch Update button when record selected from User list view for selected roles 
 
Enable Outlook Synchronization
 - ability to synchronize SmartSimple calendar and contacts with those in Outlook 
 
Enable Save Draft
 - Expose Save Draft button within a Contact profile for selected roles
Action Permission
Activity - Disable Delete
 - Applies to activities created under the company, user, or calendar. Activities for leads and opportunities in Sales Tracking will not be affected.
Activity - Disable Edit
 - Applies to activities created under the company, user, or calendar. Activities for leads and opportunities in Sales Tracking will not be affected.
Calendars - Create
 - Enables roles to create additional new calendars. All 
users
 have full control of their personal calendar regardless of this permission.
Calendars - Manager
 - Enables roles to view and add entries to calendars. All 
users
 have full control of their personal calendar regardless of this permission.
Discussion Groups - Access
 - Enables roles to access 
Discussion Groups
.
Discussion Groups - Create
 - Enables roles to 
create Discussion Groups
.
Notes - View Only
 - Roles with this restriction are not able to edit 
Notes
.
People Relationships - Access
 - Roles with this permission are able to view relationship diagrams and add new relationships between contacts but only using the defined relationship types.
People Relationships - Edit
 - Roles with this permission are able to create types or relationships such as colleague, partner spouse, etc.
Public Filters and Templates - Create
 - Roles with this permission are able to share search filters, and email templates with all other users. All users can create filters and message templates, but the user needs to be in a role associated with this visibility permission in order to make the filter or template public.
Reports - Export Data
 - Roles with this permission are able to export data from reports.
Reports - Manager
 - Roles with this permission are able to create reports, graphs based on those reports, and dashboards combining those graphs. Once created, each report and dashboard can be permissioned to other roles to view, but not to modify.
Skills & Resume - Edit
 - Roles with this permission can edit 
skills
 and 
resumes
.
Smart Folders - Manager
 - Roles with this permission can edit 
Smart Folders
.
Workflows - Attach Workflow to Company
 - Roles with this permission are able to configure 
Company-type
 and 
User-type
 
workflows
 to be triggered by a new company or modifications to a company record.
Workflows - Manager
 - Roles with this permission are able to create and edit workflows. Users without this permission can participate in workflow-driven processes, but are not able to view, edit or create new workflows.
Arcadia Permission
 
Arcadia - Disable Switching between Portals
 - select the roles that have access to the Portal drop-down, allowing them to switch between roles if they have associations with other companies.
 
Arcadia - Enable Arcadia
 - select the roles that can access the Arcadia interface.
 
Arcadia - Switch Between Arcadia and Classic View
 - select the roles can switch between the Arcadia interface and the classic SmartSimple interface.
See Also: 
Arcadia Permissions
Miscellaneous Feature Permission
Disable Recent / Action Bar
 - Disables the 
Recent
 and Back tabs for specified roles.
Enable Attribute Transaction to UTA Level 1
 - provides access to 
Transaction Attribution
.
Enable Authenticated Servers
 - provides access to 
Authenticated Servers
 feature
Enable Debug Mode
Enable Delete on Multiple File Fields
 - provides 
user’s
 the ability to delete any files stored against Multiple File Fields. Will bypass the 
No Deletion
 settings applied against individual Multiple File custom fields. 
Enable Desktop API
 -
Enable Emulation Mode - View & Edit
 - provides access to the 
Emulation Mode
 functionality, including the ability to make edits when emulating as another user 
Enable Emulation Mode - View Only
 - provides access to the 
Emulation Mode
 functionality, without the ability to make edits when emulating as another user. 
NOTE
 - if a person exist in both "Enable Emulation Mode - View Only" and "Enable Emulation Mode - View & Edit" role list, they will only be able to view.
Enable Emulation of Users in the Following Roles
 - specify what roles can be emulated
Enable Global Search
 - enables the 
Global Search
 functionality 
Enable Import Custom Field Language
 - Enables 
Translation_Import/Export
 on 
Custom_Field_Language_Settings
 for selected roles.
Enable Message Queue
 - provides access to the 
Message_Queue
 functionality 
Enable Persistent Login
 - enables the 
Persistent login
 feature
Enable Personal List View
 - enables the 
Personal Views
 functionality 
Enable Screen Capture
 - enables the 
Screen Share
 functionality 
Enable SmartCard
 - enables the 
SmartCard
 functionality 
Hide UTA Home Button / Link
 - Disables the UTA Home Button, used to return to the overall UTA from within a record for specified roles.
View Field History
 - enables the 
Field History
 feature
View ObjectSync Exchange Logs
 - provides access to 
ObjectSync
 details 
View User Access Audit Logs
 - provides access to 
 User or Contact Security Audit
Legacy Application Permission
This section allows for the configuration of Manager Permissions Associated with On-Demand Applications: 
 
Accounting Integration - Manager
 - 
 
Applicant Tracking - Manager
 - must be a member of a role with manager permission to applicant tracking if you need to manage Applicant folders, manage the available list of assignment statuses, review other people’s hiring activities, create Skills and create Job Pages.
 
Applicant Tracking - View All Jobs
 - 
 
Content Management - Manager
 - This Manager Permission will become visible when the 
Content Management application
 is enabled.
 
Front Desk - Manager
 - must be a member of a role with manager permission to configure Front Desk application .
 
Job Costing - Disable Edit
 - Restricts ability to add equipment, materials and other resources to the organization 
hierarchy
, set rates, display and filter these resource types in the 
Organization chart
 view.
 
Job Costing - Manager
 - Enables permissions within Job Costing Application. 
Roles
 with this permission are able to create and manage projects. This permission also provides the ability to add equipment, materials and other resources to the organization 
hierarchy
, set rates, display and filter these resource types in the 
Organization chart
 view.
 
Job Tracking - Manager
 - must be a member of a role with manager permission to configure Job Tracking application.
 
Sales Tracking - Disable Delete Opportunities
 - restricts ability to delete opportunities in the Sales Tracking application.
 
Sales Tracking - Disable Edit without Branch Affiliation
 - restricts ability to edit without current user's Branch being associated with the records.
 
Sales Tracking - Disable Settings Tab
 - must be a member of a role with manager permission to access Sales Tracking settings
 
Sales Tracking - Manager
 - must be a member of a role with manager permission to configure Sales Tracking application.
 
Sales Tracking - View Leads only
 - members of a role with this manager permission are only able to view Sales lead
 
Time Tracking - Manager
 - must be a member of a role with manager permission to configure Time Tracking application.
 
Web Forms - Edit Results
 - 
Roles
 with this permission are able to edit the individual results of surveys, and assessments created in the 
Web Form
 application
 
Web Forms - Manager
 - 
Roles
 with this permission have full manager rights for the 
Web Form
 application.
 
Web Forms - View Results
 - 
Roles
 with this permission are able to view the individual results of surveys, and assessments created in the 
Web Form
 application. Other users can complete forms and the summary results, but cannot see the individual results.
